duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage one or more handscoring contracts, including scheduling, resource planning, and post-project work.
Apply science expertise in item development, scoring process, and meetings with clients and educators.
Communicate clearly with various roles via chat, email, phone, and in-person/virtual interactions.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers, and provide expertise in Science and Math assessments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree within Life Science or Physical Sciences (Master’s preferred)
